body_html: @vishwakftw The test that is failing is a two-sample quantile test and indicates that there is probably a bug in either your .rsample() math or in your usage of scipy.stats.pareto in the tests. I recommend visualizing quantile-quantile plots to help diagnose, e.g. here is a notebook I've used to debug the Gamma sampler.
body_text: @vishwakftw The test that is failing is a two-sample quantile test and indicates that there is probably a bug in either your .rsample() math or in your usage of scipy.stats.pareto in the tests. I recommend visualizing quantile-quantile plots to help diagnose, e.g. here is a notebook I've used to debug the Gamma sampler.
body: @vishwakftw The test that is failing is a two-sample quantile test and indicates that there is probably a bug in either your `.rsample()` math or in your usage of `scipy.stats.pareto` in the tests. I recommend visualizing quantile-quantile plots to help diagnose, e.g. [here](https://github.com/fritzo/notebooks/blob/master/debug-gamma-sampler.ipynb) is a notebook I've used to debug the Gamma sampler.
